gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: International Surface Temperature Initiative (ISTI) Global Land Surface Temperature Databank - Stage 3 Monthly

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCEI > National Centers for Environmental Information, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
International Surface Temperature Initiative
International Surface Temperature Initiative

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: International Surface Temperature Initiative Databank Landing Page

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: The databank provides global temperatures, using a transparent process with special attention to tracking data provenance.
Website with links and resources about the International Surface Temperature Initiative and its data

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The Global Land Surface Temperature Databank contains monthly timescale mean, maximum, and minimum temperature for approximately 40,000 stations globally. It was developed as part of the International Surface Temperature Initiative. This is the global repository for all monthly timescale land surface observations from the 1800s to present and uses data deriving from sub-daily, daily, and monthly observations. It brings together data from more than 45 sources to create a single merged dataset. It will be used in the creation of various integrated global temperature resources, most notably Global Historical Climatology Network Monthly (GHCN-M) v4.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: Stage 3 data is merged Stage 2 Monthly data which has been carefully documented and researched so that it can be used by any scientist or researcher for climate research. All processing stage levels are made available to the community for provenance and quality checking. While any user has access to all files and procedures used in the production of the Databank and can reprocess or create their own algorithms to further research climate, this dataset was primarily developed for use in the Global Historical Climatology Network products.

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: Please review documentation for more information regarding appropriateness for use and research.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Users must cite this dataset as: Jared Rennie, Byron E. Gleason, Jay H. Lawrimore, Matthew J. Menne, Claude N. Williams, Peter W. Thorne, and Colin Morice. 2014. International Surface Temperature Initiative (ISTI) Global Land Surface Temperature Databank - Stage 3 Monthly. v1.0.0. NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information. doi:10.7289/V5PK0D3G [Access Date].

Distribution liability: NOAA and NCEI make no warranty, expressed or implied, regarding these data, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty. NOAA and NCEI cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in these data. If appropriate, NCEI can only certify that the data it distributes are an authentic copy of the records that were accepted for inclusion in the NCEI archives.

Use liability: NOAA and NCEI cannot provide any warranty as to the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of furnished data. Users assume responsibility to determine the usability of these data. The user is responsible for the results of any application of this data for other than its intended purpose.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Further information describing the FTP site and available documentation.

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: Stage 3 Monthly data is a merged temperature dataset with global coverage. Different algorithm variations were implemented and examined to choose the "recommended" version, though all variants are available for users to investigate. For more information on Stage 3 Development and Methodology, please view the Stage 3 "Methodology" document archived with the data.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: ISTI Databank Stage 3 was released to the public May 2013

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Version 1.1.0 released 10/15/2015 - Changes to the thresholds used in the algorithms were implemented. These threshold changes create an increase in the total number of available stations.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: International Surface Temperature Initiative (ISTI) Global Land Surface Temperature Databank - Stage 2 Monthly

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCEI > National Centers for Environmental Information, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: NOAA created the National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) by merging NOAA's National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC), and National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC), including the National Coastal Data Development Center (NCDDC), per the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015, Public Law 113-235. NCEI launched publicly on April 22, 2015.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Bulk metadata change applied on 2018-05-25. See version control repository history for metadata change details.
